NK121(ko)001:1: // ma h+aa y+aa na no g+aa ba ta ro pa
NK121(ko)001:2: pa b+he to yada&a&a&a tha na n+aa m+aa s+aa d+h+ra
NK121(ko)001:4: theg pa chen po'i rnal 'byor la 'jug pa'i thabs
NK121(ko)001:5: bye brag tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba legs par
NK121(ko)001:6: bzhugs so // nyes pa'i skyon bral yon tan mtha' dag rdzogs //
NK121(ko)001:7: bde legs ji snyed thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas //
NK121(ko)001:8: mchog gsum dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK121(ko)001:9: theg chen rnal 'byor 'jug thabs brjod par bgyi //
NK121(ko)001:10: gang zhig bdag gzhan sdug bsngal spangs 'dod cing //
NK121(ko)001:11: bde thob 'dod pas dgon par gnas par bgyi //
NK121(ko)001:12: de yang dam chos gzhung las 'di ltar gda' //
NK121(ko)001:13: 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyes dmigs mang po'i gzhi //
NK121(ko)001:14: rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa 'khor ba'i rgyu //
NK121(ko)001:15: mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba bde ba'i mchog /
NK121(ko)001:16: bdag med rtogs pa mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu //
NK121(ko)001:17: bde bas bya byed bun long thag bsrings la //
NK121(ko)001:18: dgon par bdag 'dzin gnyen por stong nyid bsgom //
NK121(ko)001:19: 'khor ba ji ltar nyes dmigs stong zhe na //
NK121(ko)001:20: 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid chos ni bzhir 'dus te //
NK121(ko)001:21: 'khor ba'i mtshan nyid mi rtag sdug bsngal dang //
NK121(ko)001:22: de yi rang rig stong dang bdag med pa'o //
NK121(ko)001:23: de la mi rtag mtshan nyid bshad par bya //
NK121(ko)001:24: snod kyi 'jig rten ri rab gling khams kyang //
NK121(ko)001:25: 'jig pa'i dus tshe bskal pa'i me byung bas //
NK121(ko)001:26: thal pa'i lhag ma tsam yang mi lus so //
NK121(ko)001:27: chu dang rlung gis 'jigs pa'ang de bzhin no //
NK121(ko)001:28: gzhan yang dbyar dro skye la dgun grang skam //
NK121(ko)001:29: lo legs lo nyes than zhod nges pa med //
NK121(ko)001:30: lo zla 'das shing 'jig pa'i dus dang nye //
NK121(ko)001:31: de la sogs pa'i mi rtag dgongs nas gda' //
NK121(ko)001:32: rtag pa lags na ci phyir 'gyur zhing 'gro //
NK121(ko)001:33: bcud kyi 'jig rten sems can tshe 'di la //
NK121(ko)001:34: nyin zhag lo zla rim gyis gcod byed pas //
NK121(ko)001:35: nyin zhag 'das shing shi dang phar phar nye //
NK121(ko)001:36: mi 'chi sdod kyang bdag la rang dbang med //
NK121(ko)001:37: skye rga na 'chi ra thag ri mo 'dra //
NK121(ko)001:38: 'chi bdag bdud ni so bya nya sdod 'dra //
NK121(ko)001:39: 'chi ba'i rkyen ni bsam gyi mi khyab ste //
NK121(ko)001:40: 'chi skye ma song dngos po gang yang med //
NK121(ko)001:41: lus ni zas kyis gso yang brnangs nas 'chi //
NK121(ko)001:42: 'jig rten 'di na che chung phyug dbul kun //
NK121(ko)001:43: 'chi bdag dbang du ma gyur gang yang med //
NK121(ko)001:44: snga ma shi ba'i mi rnams kun gyis kyang //
NK121(ko)001:45: rtag tu re zhing bu dang nor bsags kyang //
NK121(ko)001:46: bu nor phyir lus bdag la phan pa med //
NK121(ko)001:47: rang nyid dge sdig gnyis dang 'grogs te 'gro //
NK121(ko)001:48: da lta rang re gnas pa'i ring 'di la'ang //
NK121(ko)001:49: nye bshes gnyen 'dun mdza' dang mi mdza' las //
NK121(ko)001:50: na tshod kun dang rgan gzhon ji snyed gcig /
NK121(ko)001:51: shi bar mthong zhing thos pa ma lags sam //
NK121(ko)001:52: da lta'i sa steng sems can 'di kun kyang //
NK121(ko)001:53: lo brgya tshun chad gcig kyang mi lus 'chi //
NK121(ko)001:54: de bas rang re'ang 'chi ba'i chos can yin //
NK121(ko)001:55: deng shi sang shi sus kyang mi shes te //
NK121(ko)001:56: tshod 'dzin pa'ang mi 'jigs sbyin med pas //
NK121(ko)001:57: sang phod deng sang bdag ni ji ltar 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:58: 'chi ba'i tshe na pha ma bu tsha dang //
NK121(ko)001:59: phu nu mdza' bshes bran khol nor rnams kyang //
NK121(ko)001:60: bdag nyid 'chi ba'i phyir na 'ong med pas //
NK121(ko)001:61: sdug bsngal skal chen 'ga' yang ma mchis te //
NK121(ko)001:62: bdag nyid dge sdig gnyis dang chas te 'gro //
NK121(ko)001:63: de nas skyes kyang bdag nyid gcig pu skyes //
NK121(ko)001:64: tha mar 'chi yang bdag nyid gcig pu 'chi //
NK121(ko)001:65: skad cig tshe 'dir las mthun nye gzhi rnams //
NK121(ko)001:66: mgron po gnas mthun tsam ste so sor 'gro //
NK121(ko)001:67: 'o na bu tsha gnyen gzhis ci zhig phan //
NK121(ko)001:68: skad cig tsam yang mi dbye mi phod pa'i //
NK121(ko)001:69: bu dang chung ma nye gzhi rtsa lags dang //
NK121(ko)001:70: yul mkhar nor phyug longs spyod kun bor nas //
NK121(ko)001:71: de ring song ni bdag nyid gcig pur 'gro //
NK121(ko)001:72: ji tsam sdig dang brdos shing nor bsags kyang //
NK121(ko)001:73: sdig pa'i rnam smin rmongs pa bdag gis khur //
NK121(ko)001:74: bsags pa'i nor ni khong cag bu tshas khyer //
NK121(ko)001:75: de phyir bsags pa'i nor gyis ci zhig phan //
NK121(ko)001:76: bdag la shin tu phangs pa'i lus 'di yang //
NK121(ko)001:77: de ring song ni rdza chag bzhin du bor //
NK121(ko)001:78: lhan cig skyes pa'i sha rus gnyis kyang 'bye //
NK121(ko)001:79: dbang med bdag ni gcig pur 'khyams nas ni //
NK121(ko)001:80: las kyi dbang gis gang du skye 'gyur yang //
NK121(ko)001:81: de bas lus kyi phyir ni sdig mi bya //
NK121(ko)001:82: lus 'di sa gting 'dra ste chog mi shes //
NK121(ko)001:83: mi gtsang las byung mi gtsang phun po yin //
NK121(ko)001:84: na rgas 'chi sogs sdug bsngal kun gyi gnas //
NK121(ko)001:85: shi nas bor na sa yi phyogs tsam zlog /
NK121(ko)001:86: bya dang khyi spyang la sogs rnams kyi zas //
NK121(ko)001:87: bsnyen bkur 'bad kyang 'chi bdag srin pos 'phrog //
NK121(ko)001:88: mkhas pas smod cing blun po'i chags pa'i gnas //
NK121(ko)001:89: de bas lus la mkhas pa su zhig chags //
NK121(ko)001:90: lus kyi phyir ni yal ngar 'jug mi bya //
NK121(ko)001:91: 'di la gla barngana so zas byin nas su //
NK121(ko)001:92: yun gyi phan phyir dge rtsa byed du gzhug /
NK121(ko)001:93: bdag gi grogs ni dge sdig gnyis las med //
NK121(ko)001:94: de yang dge ba mtho ris thar pa'i rgyu //
NK121(ko)001:95: sdig pa ngan song gsum 'tshogs sdug bsngal rgyu //
NK121(ko)001:96: ma shi bar du'ang lus 'di mi rtag ste //
NK121(ko)001:97: khul zho byis sba gzhon nu nyid du 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:98: de nas dar la bab dang dar yol ba //
NK121(ko)001:99: rgas par gyur te lus 'di rtag na ni //
NK121(ko)001:100: gnas skabs de snyed cig tu ci ste 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:101: longs spyod bde sdug rnams kyang mi rtag ste //
NK121(ko)001:102: btsan phyug 'dzom pa sdug phongs can du 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:103: sdug phongs can yang btsan phyug 'dzom par snang //
NK121(ko)001:104: lang tsho longs spyod na rga 'chi bas 'joms //
NK121(ko)001:105: de la sogs pa'i mi rtag dgongs na brda //
NK121(ko)001:106: de bas 'jig rten mtshan nyid mi rtag go //
NK121(ko)001:107: da ni sdug bsngal mtshan nyid bshad par bya /
NK121(ko)001:108: sdug bsngal mtshan nyid skye rga na 'chi bzhi //
NK121(ko)001:109: skye ba'i sdug bsngal 'og nas bshad par bya //
NK121(ko)001:110: rgas pa yang ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal te //
NK121(ko)001:111: skra dkar gnyer 'dus gzhan gyis mthong mi thos //
NK121(ko)001:112: kha sna'i chu zag rkang lag kun kyang 'dar //
NK121(ko)001:113: sems kyis dran yang lus la nyams stobs med //
NK121(ko)001:114: bu tsha kun kyang shi na rung snyams sems //
NK121(ko)001:115: zhal lta byas kyang mi nyan dbang yang shor //
NK121(ko)001:116: kha cig srin rgan shi mchis shes kyang zer //
NK121(ko)001:117: kha cig ber dbyug thogs nas rdung bar byed //
NK121(ko)001:118: de ltar mthong thos shi 'dod shi mi btub //
NK121(ko)001:119: na ba rnams kyang 'di ltar sdug bsngal te //
NK121(ko)001:120: lus kyi 'byung ba cha ni mi mnyam pas //
NK121(ko)001:121: rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pas lus gdungs te //
NK121(ko)001:122: longs spyod mthong yang yid la 'dod pa min //
NK121(ko)001:123: lus kyi nyams stobs shor bas ldang mi nus //
NK121(ko)001:124: mdzes pa'i gzi mdangs shor bas yid btags 'dra //
NK121(ko)001:125: shi ba rnams kyang 'di ltar sdug bsngal te //
NK121(ko)001:126: gnyen bshes tshogs kyis cho nge 'debs byed kyang //
NK121(ko)001:127: de la nyan blta bsam pa'i yul med de //
NK121(ko)001:128: gnad gcod pa ni mtshon chas gtubs pa 'dra //
NK121(ko)001:129: mdza' dang mi madza'i don du 'dir byas pa'i //
NK121(ko)001:130: dge sdig las ni rmi lam yul bzhin snang //
NK121(ko)001:131: gshin rje'i pho nya shin tu 'jigs pas bskor //
NK121(ko)001:132: bred sha thon nas kun tu bltas byas kyang //
NK121(ko)001:133: mgon skyabs med cing su yang ma mthong nas //
NK121(ko)001:134: shin tu 'jigs bzhin kun tu yi mug ste //
NK121(ko)001:135: bdag nyid gar 'gro gtol med bar dor ltung //
NK121(ko)001:136: bar do na yang g.yang du lhung snyams 'jigs //
NK121(ko)001:137: de nas gshin rje'i pho nyas khrid nas ni //
NK121(ko)001:138: gshin rje chos kyi rgyal po'i spyan sngar phyin //
NK121(ko)001:139: tshe 'dir dge dang mi dge'i las byas pa //
NK121(ko)001:140: lhan cig skyes pa'i lhas ni dge ba zlo //
NK121(ko)001:141: lhan cig skyes pa'i 'dres ni mi dge brjod //
NK121(ko)001:142: gal te mi dge las kyis ngan song du //
NK121(ko)001:143: skye bar mthong nas chos rgyal 'di skad zer //
NK121(ko)001:144: khyod kyis mi yi lus 'di thob pa'i tshe //
NK121(ko)001:145: thob nas sdig pa'i rgyu ni ma spangs pas //
NK121(ko)001:146: kye ma 'di 'dra'i sdug bsngal mi bzad myong //
NK121(ko)001:147: rang gis las byas rang la rnam par smin //
NK121(ko)001:148: ngas ni 'di la ci yang ma len zer //
NK121(ko)001:149: de bas dmyal srung khro gtum 'jigs pa yis //
NK121(ko)001:150: rgyob sod gtogs khrol nga ro cher sgrogs shing //
NK121(ko)001:151: barngama zhing mtshon cha sna tshogs brdeg 'tshogs te //
NK121(ko)001:152: sa gzhi thams cad me dpung 'bar ba yis //
NK121(ko)001:153: grang ba'i dmyal ba'i gnas su khrid nas song //
NK121(ko)001:154: da ni skye ba'i sdug bsngal shes par bya //
NK121(ko)001:155: dmyal srung de dang dmyal ba'i me mthong nas //
NK121(ko)001:156: shin tu skrag sngangs cho nges cher 'debs shing //
NK121(ko)001:157: rang la barngana grangs sngon gyi sdig pa la //
NK121(ko)001:158: shin tu 'gyod kyang phan pa ci yang med //
NK121(ko)001:159: lus ni shin tu che la gzhon sha can //
NK121(ko)001:160: tshor ba che zhing dran pa'i lus thob nas //
NK121(ko)001:161: kha cig rang lus me dpung bzhin du 'bar //
NK121(ko)001:162: kha cig lcags 'bar khang pa sbrum mar 'dug /'gro ldog byed cing phyogs ni kun na bzlog /
NK121(ko)001:163: kha cig lcags las byas pa'i zangs chen du //
NK121(ko)001:164: spyi tshugs 'bru nyung chu khol blugs bzhin 'tshod //
NK121(ko)001:165: kha cig sog les 'dra zhing gtun la brdung //
NK121(ko)001:166: de la sogs pa sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab //
NK121(ko)001:167: 'jig rten 'di na mdung thung sum brgya yis //
NK121(ko)001:168: rab tu drag btab sdug bsngal gang yin pa //
NK121(ko)001:169: des ni dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal chung ngu la'ang //
NK121(ko)001:170: 'ol dang mi byi char yang mi phod do //
NK121(ko)001:171: mi yi lo ni 'bum dang brgyad khri la //
NK121(ko)001:172: dmyal ba kha cig nyin zhag gcig tu brtsi //
NK121(ko)001:173: des bsgres kho bdag lo ni dpag med thub //
NK121(ko)001:174: kha cig bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas //
NK121(ko)001:175: shi bar dga' yang shi yang mi btub bo //
NK121(ko)001:176: las ma zad pa kha cig 'jigs chags tshe //
NK121(ko)001:177: 'jig rten brgyud cung 'jig chags med par skye //
NK121(ko)001:178: yi dwags skyes kyang bkres dang skom pas gdungs //
NK121(ko)001:179: mgo bo ri rab kha ni khab mig tsam //
NK121(ko)001:180: rke rtsa rab phra gsus pa yul ljongs tsam //
NK121(ko)001:181: bza' btung mthong yang gzhan gyis bsrungs pa dang //
NK121(ko)001:182: rnag khrag ngan skyug la sogs bzhin du mthong //
NK121(ko)001:183: kha cig zos kyang khro chu khol mar 'gro //
NK121(ko)001:184: byol song skyes kyang gcig la gcig za dang //
NK121(ko)001:185: rang dbang med par bkol spyod brteg 'tshogs dang //
NK121(ko)001:186: gzhan gyis gsod sogs gti mug rmongs pas sdug /
NK121(ko)001:187: mir skye ba yang mngal na gnas pa'i tshe //
NK121(ko)001:188: ma ni 'grang tshe brag bar 'tshir ba 'dra //
NK121(ko)001:189: bkres pa'i tshe na dpyang la btags pa 'dra //
NK121(ko)001:190: drag shul byas tshe brag bar brdung ba 'dra //
NK121(ko)001:191: nyal ba'i tshe na ri yis mnan pa 'dra //
NK121(ko)001:192: btsas pa'i tshe na pags pa bshus nas ni //
NK121(ko)001:193: rtsid pa'i ngos la brud pa bas kyang sdug /
NK121(ko)001:194: tshang brul bkres skom rkang lag na sar sdug /
NK121(ko)001:195: cher skyes na yang so nam brel phongs dang //
NK121(ko)001:196: nye du bral dang dgra choms bu lon dang //
NK121(ko)001:197: bkres skom tsha grang mgron la sogs pas sdug /
NK121(ko)001:198: phongs pa rnams ni btsal thabs med nas sdug /
NK121(ko)001:199: yod pa rnams ni 'tsho skyong mel tshes sdug /
NK121(ko)001:200: zhing rmo tshong byed 'du byed las kyis sdug /
NK121(ko)001:201: de la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab //
NK121(ko)001:202: sdug pa'i gzhi ni phal cher lto rgyab gnyis //
NK121(ko)001:203: phal cher 'jig rten 'di yi longs spyod kyang //
NK121(ko)001:204: phal cher phyi ma'i ngan song sdug bsngal rgyu //
NK121(ko)001:205: bkra shis ma dang sna nag ji bzhin no //
NK121(ko)001:206: lha min skyes kyang nga rgyal phrag dog dang //
NK121(ko)001:207: khro gtum 'thab rtsod la sogs dbang gis sdug /
NK121(ko)001:208: lhar skyes kyang ni 'chi 'pho ltung ba dang //
NK121(ko)001:209: 'chi ltas lnga dang 'du byed dbang gis sdug /
NK121(ko)001:210: de ltar 'khor bar skyes pa'i nyes pa ni //
NK121(ko)001:211: sdug bsngal mdor bstan bshad pa de gnyis yin //
NK121(ko)001:212: zhib tu mdo yi nang du blta bar bya //
NK121(ko)001:213: mi rtag sdug bsngal chos ni yun ring 'dis //
NK121(ko)001:214: thog ma med nas da lta'i bar du gsungs //
NK121(ko)001:215: 'phags lam ma thob bar du da rung gdung //
NK121(ko)001:216: de gnyis gzhi dang rtsa ba rang sems yin //
NK121(ko)001:217: lus ni sems yin sems kyi rang bzhin ni //
NK121(ko)001:218: ye nas rnam dag chos sku yin pa la //
NK121(ko)001:219: rnam rtog ma yin bdag tu 'dzin pa yis //
NK121(ko)001:220: yul 'di sems nyid yin par ma shes nas //
NK121(ko)001:221: phyi nang dngos po mtshan ma so sor bzungs //
NK121(ko)001:222: lus dang longs spyod la sogs 'dod cing chags //
NK121(ko)001:223: lus ngag yid ni 'dod pa'i khol po byed //
NK121(ko)001:224: bdag gi yid dang mthun pa mi mthun las //
NK121(ko)001:225: zhe sdang la sogs nyon mongs gzhan yang skyes //
NK121(ko)001:226: nyon mongs dbang gis dge sdig las spyod pas //
NK121(ko)001:227: 'bras bu mi rtag sdug bsngal 'byung ba yin //
NK121(ko)001:228: de bas dgra ni rnam rtog bdag 'dzin yin //
NK121(ko)001:229: 'di ni rgyu bzhin dngos po med bzhin du //
NK121(ko)001:230: thog ma med nas bdag la rang gnas su //
NK121(ko)001:231: bdag nyid mnar yang ma tshor da dngos zin //
NK121(ko)001:232: bdag gi chos sku yid bzhin rin chen te //
NK121(ko)001:233: bzod pa'i mun pas dgra 'dis brkus nas su //
NK121(ko)001:234: mtshan ma'i tshang tshing gseb tu sbas nas bdag /
NK121(ko)001:236: phung po'i rgyun la tha snyad bdag ces bya //
NK121(ko)001:237: 'jig rten dgras ni gsod dam nor rnams 'phrog /
NK121(ko)001:238: de la bzod byas bsod nams tshogs kyang rdzogs //
NK121(ko)001:239: dgra 'dis zhi bde thar pa'i srog kyang gcod //
NK121(ko)001:240: de steng bzod byas 'khor bar dam du 'ching //
NK121(ko)001:241: dper na dngul rdo dngul gyi rang bazhinayanga //
NK121(ko)001:242: bzhu btul ma byas bar du dngul mi snang //
NK121(ko)001:243: de bzhin sems nyid sangs rgyas yin mod kyi //
NK121(ko)001:244: log rtog dgra ma bcos par sangs mi rgya //
NK121(ko)001:245: de bzhin phyin ci log dang nyon mongs dang //
NK121(ko)001:246: sdug bsngal nyid kyang byang chub yin mod kyi //
NK121(ko)001:247: rang gi ye shes ma thob bar du ni //
NK121(ko)001:248: bde sdug rgyu 'bras kun la mngon sum du //
NK121(ko)001:249: 'khrul rtog 'du shes dbang gis bde bar snang //
NK121(ko)001:250: rmi lam bde sdug mngon sum snang ba bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:251: rnam rtog de ni shes bya'i sgrib pa'ang min //
NK121(ko)001:252: bdag 'dzin de ni nyon mongs sgrib pa'i rgyu //
NK121(ko)001:253: stong dang bdag med 'og nas bshad par bya //
NK121(ko)001:254: da ni zhi bde mya ngan 'das pa bshad //
NK121(ko)001:255: 'khor dang zhi ba so so ma yin te //
NK121(ko)001:256: srid pa stong par rtogs pa zhi ba yin //
NK121(ko)001:257: zhi ba thob pa de yi yon tan ni //
NK121(ko)001:258: chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid rtogs pas //
NK121(ko)001:259: rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin dang nyon mongs med //
NK121(ko)001:260: ngan song gsum phongs bkres skom grang dro dang //
NK121(ko)001:261: skye rgas na 'chi la sogs sdug bsngal med //
NK121(ko)001:262: 'khor ba mi rtag sdug bsngal gtan zad nas //
NK121(ko)001:263: las su gzhan don 'ba' zhig spyod byed cing //
NK121(ko)001:264: mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab thob //
NK121(ko)001:265: nyan thos rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul tshad dang ni //
NK121(ko)001:266: mgyogs tshad glog dang 'dra ma byas na ni //
NK121(ko)001:267: ri rab bdun bdun goms pa re rer byed //
NK121(ko)001:268: mnyam par gzhag tshe stong gsum rang sar mthong //
NK121(ko)001:269: byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dper byas nas //
NK121(ko)001:270: stong gsum 'di yang yungs 'bru gcig tu tshud //
NK121(ko)001:271: yungs 'bru ma 'phel stong gsum ma bsgribs so //
NK121(ko)001:272: yungs 'bru gcig kyang stong gsum tsam du sprul //
NK121(ko)001:273: nang gi sems can kun gyis ma tshor bar //
NK121(ko)001:274: stong gsum 'di yang 'jig rten gzhan du 'phen //
NK121(ko)001:275: 'di nas rang gi stan las ma g.yos par //
NK121(ko)001:276: 'jig rten 'bum phrag mang po'i pha rol nas //
NK121(ko)001:277: sangs rgyas zhing khams rang sar lag pas len //
NK121(ko)001:278: sangs rgyas mang po so so'i spyan snga nas //
NK121(ko)001:279: mchod dang chos nyan 'chad sogs dus gcig ston //
NK121(ko)001:280: byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul de 'dra na //
NK121(ko)001:281: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul tshad ci yod //
NK121(ko)001:282: 'on kyang sangs rgyas sku gcig bstan pa la //
NK121(ko)001:283: 'jig rten rdul gyi grangs tsam sems can gyis //
NK121(ko)001:284: re rer the tshom mi gcig sna re dris //
NK121(ko)001:285: de bzhin gshegs pas tshig gcig gsungs pa la //
NK121(ko)001:286: so so rang gi lan ni btab par thos //
NK121(ko)001:287: sku gcig de la sems can ji snyed kyis //
NK121(ko)001:288: la las zhi bar la las khro bor mthong //
NK121(ko)001:289: la las rab byung la las khyim pa'i gzugs //
NK121(ko)001:290: la las nyan thos la las rang sangs gzugs //
NK121(ko)001:291: la las sems can so so'i rnam pa dang //
NK121(ko)001:292: 'byung ba che dang rtsi shing nags tshal sogs //
NK121(ko)001:293: rang rang mos pa ji ltar bzhin mthong bas //
NK121(ko)001:294: sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu ma nges te //
NK121(ko)001:295: sku gcig bstan pas sna tshogs rnams su mthong //
NK121(ko)001:296: chu yi rkyen gyis zla ba gzugs mang snang //
NK121(ko)001:297: de phyir sangs rgyas la ni gnyis med do //
NK121(ko)001:298: sangs rgyas dngos ni chos kyi sku la bya //
NK121(ko)001:299: de la rtog mi mnga' yang smon lam mthus //
NK121(ko)001:300: chos kun sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor gnas //
NK121(ko)001:301: sku gsung thugs kyis gdul bya'i zhing kun khyab //
NK121(ko)001:302: las rtog sgrib pas 'gro bas de mi mthong //
NK121(ko)001:303: nyi ma zer gyi rang bzhin de zer gyis //
NK121(ko)001:304: kun tu khyab kyang dmus long des mi mthong //
NK121(ko)001:305: sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs brnyan zhi khro sogs //
NK121(ko)001:306: de mthong skal ba 'gro ba'i mos rtog min //
NK121(ko)001:307: de phyir gzugs sku gdul bya'i sems nyid snang //
NK121(ko)001:308: de ltar 'khor ba'i nyes skyon de dang ni //
NK121(ko)001:309: mya ngan 'das pa'i yon tan de lags pas //
NK121(ko)001:310: de bas dgon par 'du 'dzi thag bsrings la //
NK121(ko)001:311: gtsor ni rnam rtog bdag 'dzin dgra 'di 'joms //
NK121(ko)001:312: rnam rtog dgra la rgol ba'i shom ra yang //
NK121(ko)001:313: dad pas gzhi bting tshul khrims mkhar brtsigs la //
NK121(ko)001:314: chos spyod bcu po sgo nas 'jug par bya //
NK121(ko)001:315: dge ba bcu ni mi dge'i gnyen por spyod //
NK121(ko)001:316: tshad med bzhi dang 'du ba rnam bzhi dang //
NK121(ko)001:317: pha rol phyin rnams bdag gzhan don du spyad //
NK121(ko)001:318: bdag rtog dbang gis 'khor ba'i sems can rnams //
NK121(ko)001:319: snying rjes sems can bsgral bar dam bcas te //
NK121(ko)001:320: byang chub sems bskyed smon lam rtse gcig gdab //
NK121(ko)001:321: de la sogs pa'i dge ba'i dpung bcas la //
NK121(ko)001:322: brtson 'grus go bgos theg chen rta zhon te //
NK121(ko)001:323: dran dang shes bzhin gnyis kyi so btsugs shing //
NK121(ko)001:324: shes rab mda' thogs bsam gtan gzhu brdung ste //
NK121(ko)001:325: bdag med rtogs pa'i stong pa mtshon chen gyis //
NK121(ko)001:326: rnam rtog bdag 'dzin ri brag rtse nas gzhoms //
NK121(ko)001:327: de phyir dad brtson dran dang shes bzhin dang //
NK121(ko)001:328: zhi gnas lhag mthong rnams kyi stong nyid bsgom //
NK121(ko)001:329: stong nyid bsgoms pa zhi bde rgyu yi mchog /
NK121(ko)001:330: chung ngu de dag dgra bcom 'bras bu thob //
NK121(ko)001:331: phyin ci log dag nyon mongs sdug bsngal dang //
NK121(ko)001:332: mtshams med la sogs sdig pa 'joms pa'i mchog /
NK121(ko)001:333: des zin sbyin sogs spyod pa'i mchog tu 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:334: des ma zin na so so'i 'bras bu tsam //
NK121(ko)001:335: myong nas zad 'gyur rnam grol rgyur mi 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:336: bdag tu lta la gnas pa'i byis pa gang //
NK121(ko)001:337: bdag ni khrims ldan tshul khrims bsrung 'dzin pa //
NK121(ko)001:338: de yi khrims srung 'bras bu myong nas ni //
NK121(ko)001:339: phyir yang ngan song gsum du de 'khor 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:340: bdag 'dzin sgyu mkhan yod kyi bar du ni //
NK121(ko)001:341: ri 'dra'i zhi gnas yod kyang mi grol te //
NK121(ko)001:342: dngos kun dngos med sgyu bzhin ma rtogs na //
NK121(ko)001:343: gtong phod thod 'dzin dad brtson yon tan gyis //
NK121(ko)001:344: bdag rtogs bcas pa'i dge tshogs ci spyad kyang //
NK121(ko)001:345: 'khor ba'i rgyu phyir bdud kyi las yin gsungs //
NK121(ko)001:346: de bas stong nyid rtag tu bsgoms par bya //
NK121(ko)001:347: chos kun rang bzhin 'di 'drar ye gnas pas //
NK121(ko)001:348: bsgom tshe stong pa nyid du de ltar brtag /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos nyid ni //
NK121(ko)001:349: 'khrul rtog can la kun rdzob gyi na tsam //
NK121(ko)001:350: log rtog 'du shes rtag pa'i dbang gis ni //
NK121(ko)001:351: sangs rgyas sems can lam dang 'bras bu dang //
NK121(ko)001:352: dge sdig bde sdug snod bcud 'jig rten sogs //
NK121(ko)001:353: bya byed nus dang rgyu 'bras sna tshogs pa //
NK121(ko)001:354: rmi lam yul bzhin mngon sum snang mod kyis //
NK121(ko)001:355: don dam gzhig na gang la'ang rang bzhin med //
NK121(ko)001:356: dngos po so sor snang ba kun rdzob yin //
NK121(ko)001:357: snang yang gang la'ang dngos med don dam mo //
NK121(ko)001:358: ji srid bsam brjod yul 'gyur kun rdzob yin //
NK121(ko)001:359: de ni so sor rtog pa shes rab yul //
NK121(ko)001:360: don dam bsam shing brjod du med pa'i phyir //
NK121(ko)001:361: de ni sems kyi yul min rang rig yul //
NK121(ko)001:362: de tshe yang ni 'di zhes bstan du med //
NK121(ko)001:363: rmi lam yul dngos gzhan la bstan med bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:364: don dam de yang bdag med rnam gnyis yin //
NK121(ko)001:365: de la gang zag bdag med bstan par bya //
NK121(ko)001:366: gang zag lnga phung rgyun yin ci yi phyir //
NK121(ko)001:367: rgyu ni las dang nyon mongs bas gang nas //
NK121(ko)001:368: 'bras bu phung por zag ste de bdag ni //
NK121(ko)001:369: sems can so so rang rang yul 'di la //
NK121(ko)001:370: nga dang bdag tu bzung nas chags 'gyur te //
NK121(ko)001:371: bdag ni na dang 'chi bkres gang gis dogs //
NK121(ko)001:372: bstod na dga' zhing smad na mi dga' ste //
NK121(ko)001:373: de la dmigs te mu stegs lta rnams 'jug /
NK121(ko)001:374: nga'am bdag de yod pa ma yin no //
NK121(ko)001:375: phung po la ni 'khrul nas brtags pa yin //
NK121(ko)001:376: dper na tho yor mthong bas mi 'khrul bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:377: nga'am bdag ni yod par cis mngon na //
NK121(ko)001:378: ming ni bdag ma yin te btags pa'am //
NK121(ko)001:379: lus kyang bdag ma yin te sha khrag rus pa rnams //
NK121(ko)001:380: 'byung chen 'dus pas phyi rol brtsigs pa 'dra //
NK121(ko)001:381: sems kyang bdag min dngos po min phyir ro //
NK121(ko)001:382: chos la bdag med pa'ang 'di ltar brtag /
NK121(ko)001:383: chos ni gzugs sogs dngos po thams cad yin //
NK121(ko)001:384: byed pa med la mtshan nyid 'dzin phyir sogs //
NK121(ko)001:385: de yi bdag po log rtog mtshan mar bcas pa dag /
NK121(ko)001:386: lha mi mthun pa yin te de med do //
NK121(ko)001:387: ci phyir zhe na phyi nang chos 'di la //
NK121(ko)001:388: dngos ni spangs nas stong nyid mi btsal gyi //
NK121(ko)001:389: snang ba nyid na stong pa nyid kyi phyir //
NK121(ko)001:390: gzhig bcom mi rtag tsam la stong mi btags //
NK121(ko)001:391: stong pa nyid na'ang gang la'ang rang bzhin med //
NK121(ko)001:392: smigs sgyu snang ba nyid na med pa bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:393: snang yang ngo bo nyid kyis med pas na //
NK121(ko)001:394: yod med gang du'ang bsam zhing brjod du med //
NK121(ko)001:395: snang yang rang bzhin med par ci mngon na //
NK121(ko)001:396: yod med dbus na gsum du mi dmigs te //
NK121(ko)001:397: yod par grags pas 'khor dang zhi ba'i chos //
NK121(ko)001:398: 'khor ba'i rang bzhin yul dang sems nyid yin //
NK121(ko)001:399: yul ni stong pa nyid du 'di ltar brtag /
NK121(ko)001:400: phyi nang snod bcud 'jig rten rang bzhin ni //
NK121(ko)001:401: 'di bzhin ye nas yod pa ma yin no //
NK121(ko)001:402: gal te 'di bzhin ye nas yong bden na //
NK121(ko)001:403: nyon mongs spang zhing byang chub sgrub tu med //
NK121(ko)001:404: kun gyis bden mthong zin pas 'bras thob ste //
NK121(ko)001:405: skye rgas na 'chi la sogs med pa'i rigs //
NK121(ko)001:406: 'di bzhin ye nas med par cis mngon na //
NK121(ko)001:407: reg snang rdul bshig rdul yang chas bshig med //
NK121(ko)001:408: de bas dngos ni sems yin rmi lam bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:409: dngos 'di sems nyid yin par cis mngon na //
NK121(ko)001:410: gal te sems min logs su dngos yod na //
NK121(ko)001:411: chu la lha dang yi dwags nya sogs kyis //
NK121(ko)001:412: rin chen rnag khrag khyim sogs mthong mi rigs //
NK121(ko)001:413: dngos po 'di la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis //
NK121(ko)001:414: zad par brgyad dang keng rus sogs bsgoms tshe //
NK121(ko)001:415: ting 'dzin goms kyang de bzhin mthong mi rigs //
NK121(ko)001:416: sems nyid yul 'dir ji ltar snang zhe na //
NK121(ko)001:417: sems kyi rang bzhin nam mkha' lta bu la //
NK121(ko)001:418: de yi mtshan nyid rnam rtog sprin bzhin snang //
NK121(ko)001:419: rang bzhin mi 'gyur tsam nyid cir yang rtog /
NK121(ko)001:420: rang gis rang sgrib rgya mtsho'i lbu sogs bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:421: sems kyi rnam rtog bag chags mthu brtas tshe //
NK121(ko)001:422: sems dang bag chags gcig min tha dad min //
NK121(ko)001:423: rnam rtog bag chags snod bcud gnyis su snang //
NK121(ko)001:424: dper na mig gi rab rib rkyen nyid ni //
NK121(ko)001:425: skra shad 'jings dang zla ba gnyis snang zhing //
NK121(ko)001:426: de bas lus 'di gzhan dbang sems nyid yin //
NK121(ko)001:427: de las dmigs te rnam shes 'byung ba'i phyir //
NK121(ko)001:428: yul sems gnyis kyang rten 'brel sgyu ma bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:429: de ltar yul 'di sems nyid yin pa la //
NK121(ko)001:430: de las 'khrul nas gzhan du mtshan mar bzung //
NK121(ko)001:431: thag bu sbrul du mthong nas sbrul lta bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:432: mtshan ma de yang dngos su gang zhe na //
NK121(ko)001:433: dngos po so sor mngon sum yon snang ba'i //
NK121(ko)001:434: sangs rgyas sems can bdag gzhan bzang ngan dang //
NK121(ko)001:435: rtsi shing nags tshal yul mkhar khang khyim sogs //
NK121(ko)001:436: mdor na sems can kun la mngon sum pa'i //
NK121(ko)001:437: rnam shes drug gi yul 'di thams cad yin //
NK121(ko)001:438: de ni btags pa tsam yin gtan med do //
NK121(ko)001:439: med kyang rang nyid de la spyod byed de //
NK121(ko)001:440: de bas byis pa mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams //
NK121(ko)001:441: 'jig rten 'di na med pa'i chos la spyod //
NK121(ko)001:442: dper na smig sgyu snang ba chur 'dzin dang //
NK121(ko)001:443: mig skyon snang la skra zla dngos 'dzin dang //
NK121(ko)001:444: rmi lam yul la yong bzung rang spyod bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:445: de nas kun brtags so so skye bo'i yul //
NK121(ko)001:446: sems nyid yul snang dag pa 'jig rten yul //
NK121(ko)001:447: gnyid sad pa na rmi lam yul med bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:448: phyi nang dngos por snang ba'i yul 'di yang //
NK121(ko)001:449: ma rig gnyid sad med pa mthong na med //
NK121(ko)001:450: de bas yul sems rang gi rtog pa yin //
NK121(ko)001:451: yang na mi rtog lhun grub sangs rgyas kyis //
NK121(ko)001:452: dngos gcig ma gzigs phyir yang yul med do //
NK121(ko)001:453: rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin dang bcas pa yi //
NK121(ko)001:454: rtog pa'i sems kyang kha dog dbyibs dang ni //
NK121(ko)001:455: pho mo la sogs dngos por ma grub med //
NK121(ko)001:456: yang na skad cig ma ste rang bzhin med //
NK121(ko)001:457: yang na yul med pas na sems med do //
NK121(ko)001:458: yang na rten 'brel yin phyir skye ba med //
NK121(ko)001:459: de bas 'khor ba stong zhing bdag med pa'o //
NK121(ko)001:460: 'khor ba med pas mya ngan 'das pa'ang med //
NK121(ko)001:461: mya ngan 'das pa'i mthar thug sangs rgyas yin //
NK121(ko)001:462: de yi chos sku dbyings dang ye shes yin //
NK121(ko)001:463: de gnyis la yang dngos med tha snyad tsam //
NK121(ko)001:464: gzugs sku rnam gnyis ye shes gzugs brnyan yin //
NK121(ko)001:465: ye shes med pas gzugs brnyan ga la yod //
NK121(ko)001:466: yang na gzugs brnyan yin phyin dngos med pas //
NK121(ko)001:467: sangs rgyas med de ming tsam ming yang med //
NK121(ko)001:468: mdor na 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos //
NK121(ko)001:469: rang bzhin sgyu ma tsam du'ang med pa'i phyir //
NK121(ko)001:470: ci snang ci srid chos nyid stong pa yin //
NK121(ko)001:471: chos nyid de la byang chub ces bya bas //
NK121(ko)001:472: byang chub bya dang byed pa mi dmigs phyir //
NK121(ko)001:473: sangs rgyas byang chub tha snyad tsam ste med //
NK121(ko)001:474: yod med gnyis ni ltos pa'i chos yin pas //
NK121(ko)001:475: yod par ma grub pas na med pa'ang med //
NK121(ko)001:476: chos can med phyir chos nyid stong pa'ang med //
NK121(ko)001:477: mtha' gnyis med phyir dbus kyang mi 'grub ste //
NK121(ko)001:478: chos nyid bsam zhing brjod du med pa la //
NK121(ko)001:479: dbus su btags na mtha' bzhi skyon du 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:480: de phyir chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin ni //
NK121(ko)001:481: lho sprin snang zhing ci yang med pa bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:482: chos kun snang zhing gang la'ang dngos med par //
NK121(ko)001:483: snang ba nyid na dngos po snang med de //
NK121(ko)001:484: yod med dbus dang gsum du ma grub phyir //
NK121(ko)001:485: ci yang med pas ci yang bsam du med //
NK121(ko)001:486: mthong thos la sogs tha snyad rnams dang bral //
NK121(ko)001:487: sems dang sems byung shes pa'i yul las 'das //
NK121(ko)001:488: mngon sum la sogs tshad mas gzhal du med //
NK121(ko)001:489: de bas rgyal bas chos gcig ma gzigs phyir //
NK121(ko)001:490: tshig gcig tsam gyi chos kyang bshad pa med //
NK121(ko)001:491: gdul bya'i rtog pas sde snod bshad par snang //
NK121(ko)001:492: so sor yod na ci yang yin pa'i phyir //
NK121(ko)001:493: bsam pa'i yul du gyur na'ang de min pas //
NK121(ko)001:494: bsam brjod yul 'di brtags tsam 'khrul pa yin //
NK121(ko)001:495: de bas chos kun nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin //
NK121(ko)001:496: nam mkha' ming tsam mtshan nyid ci yang med //
NK121(ko)001:497: de bas thams cad ye nas stong nyid phyir //
NK121(ko)001:498: nyon mongs spangs med byang chub sgrub med de //
NK121(ko)001:499: byang chub thob dang re dogs spangs blangs dang //
NK121(ko)001:500: rnam thar gsum dang lam dang gnyen po'ang med //
NK121(ko)001:501: don dam bden pa nyid kyang dngos med pas //
NK121(ko)001:502: don dam rnam grangs skye 'gags med sogs dang //
NK121(ko)001:503: stong nyid bsgom pa'ang tha snyad tsam yin phyir //
NK121(ko)001:504: bsgom pa'i yul med sgom med sems kyang med //
NK121(ko)001:505: bsgom rgyu med phyir mi sgom bzhag med de //
NK121(ko)001:506: lus sems chos sogs skyon yon mi dmigs phyir //
NK121(ko)001:507: dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs nam mkha' bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:508: don 'di rtogs par 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
NK121(ko)001:509: mnyan bsam gsum gyi sgo nas rtogs nas bya //
NK121(ko)001:510: de gsum yul yang ming dang gnyis ka dang //
NK121(ko)001:511: don nyid yin pas bsam sgom rnam gnyis kyis //
NK121(ko)001:512: lung dang man ngag bsten nas rigs pas kyang //
NK121(ko)001:513: chos kun bdag med yin pa'i gtan tshigs ni //
NK121(ko)001:514: gong du so sor phye zhing bstan pa bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:515: dngos kun gzhig cing yang dang yang dpyad na //
NK121(ko)001:516: tshig tsam ma yin blo rting go bar 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:517: go ba'i tshe na rig pa 'di ltar skye //
NK121(ko)001:518: ci yang min pas brtags pa bzhin snang zhing //
NK121(ko)001:519: sems can rnams kyi mngon sum gyur pa yin //
NK121(ko)001:520: sangs rgyas sems can la sogs mtshan ma rnams //
NK121(ko)001:521: rmi lam yul bzhin rtog pa tsam yin pas //
NK121(ko)001:522: sgyu ma shes pas ci yang mthong med bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:523: snang yang ci yang mi mthong rig pa skye //
NK121(ko)001:524: rig pa de yang rang gi tsam du zad //
NK121(ko)001:525: de tshe dngos kun ci yang min par mthong //
NK121(ko)001:526: ci yang min la'ang bsam pa'i yul med pas //
NK121(ko)001:527: de bas bsam brjod mi 'jug mthong snang med //
NK121(ko)001:528: brjod med ngang tsam du yang mi mthong bas //
NK121(ko)001:529: sems la myong reg dga' sdug med par 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:530: sems kyang dngos med nam mkha' bzhin mthong bas //
NK121(ko)001:531: nam mkha' bzhin du ci la'ang mi gnas so //
NK121(ko)001:532: de tshe blang dor mi mthong rtog skye ste //
NK121(ko)001:533: 'phags dang sems can bdag gzhan bzang ngan dang //
NK121(ko)001:534: dge sdig bde sdug gtsang dme spangs blang sogs //
NK121(ko)001:535: gnyis par snang kun gnyis su med rtogs pas //
NK121(ko)001:536: so sor mthong dmigs 'du shes mi 'jug go //
NK121(ko)001:537: de phyir thams cad gnyis med mnyam par mthong //
NK121(ko)001:538: de ltar rtogs na chos sku mthong ba yin //
NK121(ko)001:539: bde gshegs rnams dang yul gcig spyod phyir ro //
NK121(ko)001:540: 'phags dang rnal 'byor rtogs pa'i khyad par ni //
NK121(ko)001:541: rnal 'byor pa la ji srid mnyam bzhag tsam //
NK121(ko)001:542: byang chub sems dpa'i rtogs pa mngon du gyur //
NK121(ko)001:543: sangs rgyas pa la rtogs pa lhun gyis grub //
NK121(ko)001:544: sangs rgyas sems can rang bzhin gcig mod kyi //
NK121(ko)001:545: rnam rtog yod med dbang gis khyad zhugs pas //
NK121(ko)001:546: tha na chos nyid ngang la dmigs kyang rung //
NK121(ko)001:547: rnam rtog thams cad 'khor ba'i chings ma ste //
NK121(ko)001:548: mi rtog bsam 'das rang rig chos sku bas //
NK121(ko)001:549: rnam rtog spang zhing rang rig thob bya'i phyir //
NK121(ko)001:550: bsgom tshe 'di ltar bsam zhing bzhag par bya //
NK121(ko)001:551: srid dang zhi bar snang ba'i chos 'di ni //
NK121(ko)001:552: yod med la sogs gang du'ang ma grub phyir //
NK121(ko)001:553: ci yang min pas cir yang bsam du med //
NK121(ko)001:554: bsam du med pas ci yang mi bsam zhing //
NK121(ko)001:555: 'bad rtsol bstod 'dzin dmigs pa kun spangs nas //
NK121(ko)001:556: mi gsal mi rtog tsam la mi gsan par //
NK121(ko)001:557: lus sems mi sdom khong lhod gyi na tsam //
NK121(ko)001:558: mi g.yo gsal ba'i ngang la rang bzhin te //
NK121(ko)001:559: rtog med btang snyoms gnas la brtson 'grus bya //
NK121(ko)001:560: 'phral byung yul rtog rang byung rang zhir bzhag /
NK121(ko)001:561: de tshe rtogs pa kun byung 'ong zhes bya //
NK121(ko)001:562: bar bar sems kyis sems kyang ci byed brtag /
NK121(ko)001:563: bying rgod byung na spro dang skyo ba skyed //
NK121(ko)001:564: snang ba mi 'gogs pa ni thabs yin te //
NK121(ko)001:565: snang ba mi 'dzin mi gnas shes rab yin //
NK121(ko)001:566: ma goms bar du mtshan ma sems kyang sbyang //
NK121(ko)001:567: chos nyid don la bsam zhing gtong 'dzin bya //
NK121(ko)001:568: yang na sems kyis sems la blta bar bya //
NK121(ko)001:569: yang na snang la rang bzhin med par ni //
NK121(ko)001:570: bsam zhing gsal la rtog pa med par bzhag /
NK121(ko)001:571: dran dang shes bzhin bsrung zhing skyon byung na //
NK121(ko)001:572: brtsol bas yang dang yang du mnyam par bzhag /
NK121(ko)001:573: glo bur yul rtog byung ba zhig cing gtang //
NK121(ko)001:574: de ltar bsgoms na sems nyams rnam gsum byung //
NK121(ko)001:575: dang por ri gzar chu drag mgyogs pa 'dra //
NK121(ko)001:576: gnyis pa shin tu dal bab chu klung bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:577: gsum pa mi g.yo gsal bas mtsho gting 'dra //
NK121(ko)001:578: de ni zhi gnas lhag mthong zung 'brel yin //
NK121(ko)001:579: btang snyoms gsum yang de tshe rim bzhin 'byung //
NK121(ko)001:580: de tshe lus sems shin tu sbyangs pa'ang thob //
NK121(ko)001:581: stong nyid goms tshe rtags kyang 'di ltar 'byung //
NK121(ko)001:582: dngos kun mtshan mar 'dzin cing 'byed byed de //
NK121(ko)001:583: log rtog 'du shes je nyung je zhir 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:584: chags sdang la sogs nyon mongs je chung 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:585: dge sdig la sogs spang blang je gsal rtogs //
NK121(ko)001:586: snying rje phan sems je 'phel je 'phel 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:587: mthong snang yul ni sems rtogs bag chags pas //
NK121(ko)001:588: sems rtog je phra mthong snang med par 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:589: mngon shes la sogs yon tan rim gyis 'byung //
NK121(ko)001:590: ma byung bar du'ang brtags dang ci mthun bya //
NK121(ko)001:591: mnyam par bzhag la ldang tshe'ang 'di ltar dpyad //
NK121(ko)001:592: chos sku stong pa nyid du rtogs mod kyang //
NK121(ko)001:593: rmi lam gnyis na rgyu 'bras mi bslu bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:594: 'khrul rtog ma zad bar du las yod pas //
NK121(ko)001:595: dge sdig las la rtag tu spang blang bya //
NK121(ko)001:596: sdig byas bshags dang mi dge sems kyis sbyangs //
NK121(ko)001:597: mnyam pa gdeng du gyur na rtogs dang sbyar //
NK121(ko)001:598: dngos kun dngos med sgyu ma bzhin du lta //
NK121(ko)001:599: dge spyod thams cad mi dmigs bzhin du spyad //
NK121(ko)001:600: dran dang shes bzhin bsgom zhing ci zin bya //
NK121(ko)001:601: 'dus byas dge rtsa mi 'gal nus tshad bya //
NK121(ko)001:602: nyon mongs skyes na gnyen por stong nyid bsgom //
NK121(ko)001:603: dgon pas skyo na mi rtag sdug bsngal bsam //
NK121(ko)001:604: dus gsum 'phags pa mngon sum bzhugs pas na //
NK121(ko)001:605: yan lag bdun pa rtse gcig sems kyis bya //
NK121(ko)001:606: dge rtsa ci byas byang chub chen por bsngo //
NK121(ko)001:607: sems can rnams la snying rje'i phan sems bskyed //
NK121(ko)001:608: khro gnyer ngo gnag spangs la 'dzum bzhin bya //
NK121(ko)001:609: zhi des gsong por bya zhing 'brel pa bskyung //
NK121(ko)001:610: bdag la mi bstod rang skyon blta bar bya //
NK121(ko)001:611: snyan grags bdud kyi las yin sems g.yeng bas //
NK121(ko)001:612: mngon shes thob kyang yon tan mi sbrag na //
NK121(ko)001:613: gzugs mthong sgra thob la sogs smos ci dgos //
NK121(ko)001:614: grags dang grags bstod bstod smod bde sdug dang //
NK121(ko)001:615: brnyed dang ma brnyed 'jig rten chos brgyad po //
NK121(ko)001:616: brag cha rmi lam 'dra bar go mnyam bya //
NK121(ko)001:617: sems can rang bzhin skyon gyis rang bzhin pas //
NK121(ko)001:618: byed min byas pas gzhan skyon mi rtog go //
NK121(ko)001:619: de ltar stong nyid yun ring goms byas la //
NK121(ko)001:620: tshogs chen gnyis kyang rang bzhin rdzogs par 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:621: sgrib pa gnyis kyang rim gyis 'byang gyur te //
NK121(ko)001:622: rnam rtog bdag 'dzin sos kha'i chab dron 'dra //
NK121(ko)001:623: je zhi je phra mi rtog dbyings su 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:624: mi rtog lhun gyis grub pa chos sku yin //
NK121(ko)001:625: de tshe'ang mthong ba'i yul dang sems bral nas //
NK121(ko)001:626: ye shes chos nyid rang rig rang la gnas //
NK121(ko)001:627: rtog 'dzin med par shes bya ngang gis mkhyen //
NK121(ko)001:628: mthu dang rdzu 'phrul yon tan bsam mi khyab //
NK121(ko)001:629: de thob nas ni smon lam thugs rje yis //
NK121(ko)001:630: 'gro ba'i don du gzugs sku rang bzhin 'byung //
NK121(ko)001:631: de nas sems can so so'i mos pa bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:632: sku gsung thugs kyi rnam 'phrul ston byed cing //
NK121(ko)001:633: 'khor ba ma stongs bar du gzhan don spyad //
NK121(ko)001:634: de phyir bdag kyang dgon par 'chi ba lags //
NK121(ko)001:635: yas bdag kyang ni de bzhin dgongs mdzod la //
NK121(ko)001:636: dam chos bsgrub la brtson 'grus 'bad par rigs //
NK121(ko)001:637: 'khor ba mi rtag sdug bsngal de dang ni //
NK121(ko)001:638: byang chub 'o skol kun gyi thun mong lags //
NK121(ko)001:639: ston pa'i bstan pa'i gdugs bzhin kun snyoms kyang //
NK121(ko)001:640: byang bltas phug 'dra skye bos mi rtogs pas //
NK121(ko)001:641: de phyir chos mdzad rnams la zhu ba ni //
NK121(ko)001:642: do gcig mchis pas sang phod mchis pa bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:643: tshe 'di mchis pas slad ma mchis par nges //
NK121(ko)001:644: sang phod lo dang sku tshe slad ma gnyis //
NK121(ko)001:645: gang sngar 'ong ba su la'ang brtol med na //
NK121(ko)001:646: sang phod don du song 'am 'bod pa bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:647: slad ma'i don du ci phyir 'bad mi mdzad //
NK121(ko)001:648: mi rtag srin pos gzungs ba ma tshor ram //
NK121(ko)001:649: 'chi bar nges pas bsod nams myur du mdzod //
NK121(ko)001:650: nges par 'chi bsam las kyis bsags pa 'grangs //
NK121(ko)001:651: tshe 'di zil pa 'dra ste med la khad //
NK121(ko)001:652: dbugs 'di na bun 'dra ste yal la khad //
NK121(ko)001:653: lus 'di sgyu ma 'dra ste snang la med //
NK121(ko)001:654: sems 'di glog dang 'dra ste skad cig ma //
NK121(ko)001:655: bu smad nye bzhi lus dang longs spyod ni //
NK121(ko)001:656: sdug cing phongs dang mi rtag 'ja' tshon 'dra //
NK121(ko)001:657: phung po g.yar po 'dra bar dgongs mdzod la //
NK121(ko)001:658: dam chos bsgrub la tshe 'dir ma 'bad na //
NK121(ko)001:659: dal 'byor mi lus thob pa chud pa zos //
NK121(ko)001:660: slad mar mi yi lus kyang mi thob na //
NK121(ko)001:661: bla med byang chub 'bras bu ga la thob //
NK121(ko)001:662: ngan song skyes nas sdug bsngal skyes pa'i tshe //
NK121(ko)001:663: tshe 'di'i btsan phyug snyan grags des ci phan //
NK121(ko)001:664: sngar 'grang da lta bkres la mi phan bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:665: dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal shes kyang mi 'jigs pa //
NK121(ko)001:666: mi rtag lus la chags pas sdig spyod pa //
NK121(ko)001:667: rang gis rang brlag kye ma'o snying re rje //
NK121(ko)001:668: 'khor ba'i gcong rong sdug bsngal gnas 'di ni //
NK121(ko)001:669: rmongs pa bdag gis brtags kyang 'di ltar gda' //
NK121(ko)001:670: sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad kyis nyam re thag /
NK121(ko)001:671: ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal skyi re g.ya' //
NK121(ko)001:672: dmyal khams bco brgyad sdug bsngal ya re cha //
NK121(ko)001:673: skye rgas na 'chi'i sdug bsngal rgyun re ring //
NK121(ko)001:674: de phyir bdag dang bdag la snying rje na //
NK121(ko)001:675: chos mdzad rnams kyis de ltar ma gzigs sam //
NK121(ko)001:676: gzigs na ci phyir khyed sems bde bar 'dug /
NK121(ko)001:677: de bas rnam rtog bdag 'dzin kha ma 'dzin //
NK121(ko)001:678: bu dang chung ma gnyen bshes la sogs dang //
NK121(ko)001:679: lus dang longs spyod kun la yid ma chags //
NK121(ko)001:680: mi rtag sdug bsngal bsam zhing 'jigs pa bskyed //
NK121(ko)001:681: mi dge spang zhing dge spyod chos bzhin mdzod //
NK121(ko)001:682: chos bzhin med na chos pa'i ming ci yod //
NK121(ko)001:683: tshul khrims med na dge slong ci la zer //
NK121(ko)001:684: dam tshig med na sngags pa ci la zer //
NK121(ko)001:685: sdig ni chung yang mi brnyas spang zhing bshags //
NK121(ko)001:686: chu thig nyung bsags snod chen gang ba bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:687: dge ba chung yang dang du blang zhing spyad //
NK121(ko)001:688: rdul phran bsags pas snod kyi 'jig rten bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:689: thar pa bdag la rag las 'di la ni //
NK121(ko)001:690: gzhan gyi grogs bgyir ci yang ma mchis te //
NK121(ko)001:691: grogs bgyir mchis na thugs rje che mnga' ba'i //
NK121(ko)001:692: 'phags pas 'gro kun dus gcig grol bar rigs //
NK121(ko)001:693: de phyir 'gro la snying rje phan sems bskyed //
NK121(ko)001:694: rnam rtog dgra yi gnyen por stong nyid bsgom //
NK121(ko)001:695: dge ba ci mdzad byang chub chen por bsngosa //
NK121(ko)001:696: de ltar spyad na yun du bde bar 'gyur //
NK121(ko)001:697: yun du bde ba'i chos don ma rtogs na //
NK121(ko)001:698: skra dkar skyes shing gnyer ma'i tshogs 'dus kyang //
NK121(ko)001:699: byis pa shed ma byed dang 'dra bas na //
NK121(ko)001:700: don la mkhas pas brtag na snying re rje //
NK121(ko)001:701: de bas dam chos gzhung bzhin spyad par rigs //
NK121(ko)001:702: slad ma nyan bshad mdzad la zhu ba ni //
NK121(ko)001:703: chos kyis bdag bshad bdag gis chos ma bshad //
NK121(ko)001:704: don rtogs bya phyir dang por nyan kyang dgos //
NK121(ko)001:705: nges pa snyed nas tshig mang bslab mi dgos //
NK121(ko)001:706: tshig mi zad phyir nyan pas mthar phyin med //
NK121(ko)001:707: chos kyang shes pas mi chog sgrub pa gces //
NK121(ko)001:708: lam rgyud shes kyang mi 'gro shes ci phan //
NK121(ko)001:709: nyan bshad dgos pas sgrub thabs btsal phyir yin //
NK121(ko)001:710: mi sgrub mnyan bshad don chung yi re chad //
NK121(ko)001:711: bro mkhan bsgrung mkhan bro bsrung 'chad pa bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:712: de ni mi nag chos kyi lo rgyus mkhan //
NK121(ko)001:713: bsgrub thabs mchog ni stong nyid bsgom pa yin //
NK121(ko)001:714: stong nyid bsgoms pas go 'phang gcod mthong na //
NK121(ko)001:715: thos mang tshig la mkhas pa de tsho 'dra //
NK121(ko)001:716: bsgrub pa'i lam bstan lta bu'i 'bras bu thob //
NK121(ko)001:717: ma sgrubs kun dga' bos kyang ma thob bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:718: shes tsam phan med gzhung las 'di skad 'byung //
NK121(ko)001:719: gal te mang du thos pas de rgyags shing //
NK121(ko)001:720: thos pas rgyags nas tshul khrims mi bsrung na //
NK121(ko)001:721: tshul khrims 'chal bas ngan 'gror de 'gro ste //
NK121(ko)001:722: thos pa mang pos de la skyob mi nus //
NK121(ko)001:723: gzhan yang chos shes nga rgyal grags pa yis //
NK121(ko)001:724: dmyal bar skyes nas bya ngang dgags brgyad skye //
NK121(ko)001:725: gzhan yang shes rab ma sgrub 'di 'dra gsung //
NK121(ko)001:726: rgya mtsho'i nang du skam nas 'chi ba dang //
NK121(ko)001:727: gzhan yang sbyin gtong bdag nyid ltog shi dang /
NK121(ko)001:728: mi bkren kha g.yos mkhan dang nad pa rnams //
NK121(ko)001:729: sman gtong mi nus phan tshun sman slob dang //
NK121(ko)001:730: gla mis gzhan gyi nor bgrangs 'dra zhes gsungs //
NK121(ko)001:731: gzhan yang khe phyir gzhan la chos 'chad pa //
NK121(ko)001:732: rin chen snyed kyang spang ba 'dra zhes gsungs //
NK121(ko)001:733: de phyir don la dpyod sems tshig phyir min //
NK121(ko)001:734: tshig 'di don min don ni dngos 'di yin //
NK121(ko)001:735: don ni gser 'dra tshig ni sgron ma bzhin //
NK121(ko)001:736: gser snyed nas ni sgron mas ci zhig bya //
NK121(ko)001:737: don la dpyad cing bsam na rang rig skye //
NK121(ko)001:738: tshig gi nyan bshad bskal par byas kyang ni //
NK121(ko)001:739: rang rig med de nyon mongs 'phel ba'i rgyu //
NK121(ko)001:740: de phyir don la mkhas pas mkhas pa yin //
NK121(ko)001:741: tshig la mkhas pas mkhas pa ma yin te //
NK121(ko)001:742: de phyir phyi nang dngos 'di bshig cing dpyod //
NK121(ko)001:743: 'on kyang tshig min blo rting rang rig 'byung //
NK121(ko)001:744: kha cig deng sang sgrub pa'i dus kyang min //
NK121(ko)001:745: gang zag gis kyang de mi rtogs zer ba //
NK121(ko)001:746: rang la spags nas bka' la skur 'debs yin //
NK121(ko)001:747: skal ldan bzang ngan med par rtogs par snang //
NK121(ko)001:748: sde snod gsum po 'chad kyang skal med na //
NK121(ko)001:749: tha snyad 'chad kyis stong nyid don mi rtogs //
NK121(ko)001:750: theg pa dgu yang gang zag mos dbang dang //
NK121(ko)001:751: snying rje shes rab che chung dbang gsungs pas //
NK121(ko)001:752: bsgrub pa pos kyang rang gi nyams sbyar la //
NK121(ko)001:753: gang lcogs pa yi sgo nas 'jug par bya //
NK121(ko)001:754: rang gis mi lcogs bzhin du gong gi che la re nas gong ma khas len pa //
NK121(ko)001:755: thang stong sdig pa rang gis khas len pas dmyal bar skye zhes gzhung las 'byung //
NK121(ko)001:756: theg pa'i rang bzhin shes rab snying rje kho na ste //
NK121(ko)001:757: bdag dang sangs rgyas dbyer med rtogs pa shes rab yin //
NK121(ko)001:758: sems can kun la bu bzhin byams pa snying rje yin //
NK121(ko)001:759: de gnyis che chung dbang gis theg pa'i khyad par bstan //
NK121(ko)001:760: gang zhig de gnyis mi ldan theg chen khas 'ches pa //
NK121(ko)001:761: long sprang nga nyid rgyal po yin zhes zer ba bzhin du brdzun //
NK121(ko)001:762: de bas gong ma khas blangs pas ni rang gi gzhung bzhin shin tu 'bad par rigs //
NK121(ko)001:763: khas len mi nus pas kyang mos dang smon sems bskyed bya'i bskur mi gdab //
NK121(ko)001:764: gsang sngags skye sa gnyis ni rdo rje dmyal dang sangs rgyas sa yin gzhan ni med //
NK121(ko)001:765: lta spyod dam tshig ldan zhing bsgrub pa la shin tu brtson par sangs rgyas sar 'gro gsung //
NK121(ko)001:766: de gsum mi ldan sgrub la g.yel zhing spyod pa 'dod phyogs tsam spyod dmyal bar skye //
NK121(ko)001:767: de bas gsang sngags spyod pas pang du sbrul 'og bzhin du shin tu 'bad par rigs //
NK121(ko)001:768: bde gshegs spyod yul bsam 'das zab mo'i don la spyod pa dang //
NK121(ko)001:769: rgyal sras bskul bar bdag 'dra rmongs pa bskul bar ma 'os kyang //
NK121(ko)001:770: bdag bas rmangs pa 'ga' la phan grang snyam nas chos 'di bgyis //
NK121(ko)001:771: nongs gyur ci mchis 'phags dang mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol //
NK121(ko)001:772: dge rtsa 'dis ni kun gyis gzhung bzhin bsgrubs nas zhi bde thob par shog //
